verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H4150>them<s%>, The set feasts of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which ye shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations<s%>, even these are my set <S%H4150>feasts<s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H4399>work<s%> be <S%H6213>done<s%>: but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%>, a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>; ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no manner of <S%H4399>work<s%>: it is a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%>.
These are the set <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, even <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations<s%>, which ye shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> in their appointed <S%H4150>season<s%>.
In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> day of the month at <S%H6153>even<s%>, is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H6453>passover<s%>.

And on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the same <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>.
In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> ye shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>: ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>.

But ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>; ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>, When ye are come into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> unto <S%H7114>you<s%>, and shall reap the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> <S%H935>thereof<s%>, then ye shall bring the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> of the <S%H7225>first-fruits<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>:

and he shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> for <S%H4283>you<s%>: on the morrow after the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall wave <S%H5130>it<s%>.

And in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when ye <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%>, ye shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> a <S%H3532>he-lamb<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> thereof shall be <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%>; and the <S%H5262>drink-offering<s%> thereof shall be of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> neither <S%H3899>bread<s%>, nor parched <S%H7039>grain<s%>, nor fresh <S%H3759>ears<s%>, until this <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5704>until<s%> ye have <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%>: it is a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H5608>count<s%> unto you from the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that ye <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> of the <S%H8573>wave-offering<s%>; <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> shall there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8549>complete<s%>:

even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> shall ye <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; and ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Ye shall bring <S%H935>out<s%> of your <S%H4186>habitations<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8573>wave<s%> - <S%H3899>loaves<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%>: they shall be of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>, they shall be <S%H644>baken<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven<s%>, for <S%H1061>first-fruits<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H7126>present<s%> with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H259>old<s%>, and one <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>: they shall be a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, with their <S%H5930>meal-offering<s%>, and their <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%>, even an <S%H4503>offering<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5795>he-goat<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>he-lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H2077>peace-offerings<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H1061>first-fruits<s%> for a <S%H8573>wave-offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, with the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%>: they shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

And ye shall make <S%H7121>proclamation<s%> on the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>; there shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> unto <S%H6213>you<s%>; ye shall do no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>: it is a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

And when ye <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H3615>wholly<s%> <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of thy <S%H7704>field<s%>, neither shalt thou <S%H3950>gather<s%> the <S%H3951>gleaning<s%> of thy <S%H7105>harvest<s%>: thou shalt <S%H5800>leave<s%> them for the <S%H6041>poor<s%>, and for the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, In the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, shall be a solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%> unto <S%H2146>you<s%>, a memorial of <S%H8643>blowing<s%> of <S%H6944>trumpets<s%>, a holy <S%H4744>convocation<s%>.
Ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>; and ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Howbeit <S%H389><s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of this <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%>: it shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> unto <S%H6031>you<s%>, and ye shall afflict your <S%H5315>souls<s%>; and ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no manner of <S%H4399>work<s%> in that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>; for it is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%>, to make <S%H3725>atonement<s%> for you <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
For whatsoever <S%H5315>soul<s%> it be that shall not be <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> in that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>; he shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And whatsoever <S%H5315>soul<s%> it be that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> any manner of <S%H4399>work<s%> in that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H5315>soul<s%> will I <S%H6>destroy<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
Ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no manner of <S%H4399>work<s%>: it is a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%>.

It shall be unto you a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%>, and ye shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls<s%>: in the <S%H8672>ninth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>, from <S%H6153>even<s%> unto <S%H6153>even<s%>, shall ye <S%H7673>keep<s%> your <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, On the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of this <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>: ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> unto <S%H7126>you<s%>; and ye shall offer an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: it is a solemn <S%H6116>assembly<s%>; ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>.

These are the set <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which ye shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations<s%>, to <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and a <S%H5930>meal-offering<s%>, a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, and <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%>, <S%H1697>each<s%> on its <S%H3117>own<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>;

besides the <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and besides your <S%H4979>gifts<s%>, and besides all your <S%H5088>vows<s%>, and besides all your <S%H5071>freewill-offerings<s%>, which ye <S%H5414>give<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Howbeit on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, when ye have <S%H622>gathered<s%> in the <S%H8393>fruits<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, ye shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%>, and on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H3947>take<s%> you on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of <S%H1926>goodly<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%>, <S%H3709>branches<s%> of <S%H8558>palm-trees<s%>, and <S%H6057>boughs<s%> of <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%>, and <S%H6155>willows<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%>; and ye shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> it a <S%H2282>feast<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%>: it is a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>; ye shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> it in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.
Ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; all that are <S%H249>home-born<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths<s%>;

that your <S%H1755>generations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I made the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths<s%>, when I brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>declared<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the set <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
